website_summaries.verdict: The best smart light bulb available – it's the third generation Hue and just keeps getting better. Pricey but worth the investment if you want smart lighting in your home.
pros: A super-intuitive bulb that's compatible with numerous devices including Alexa and Echo
It also produces a wide array of whites and almost endless colors that are extremely accurate and bold
cons: Costly, considering it requires the Hue hub and additional dimmer switch if you want to activate the dimming capability
It also takes some tech savvy to set it up

customer_reviews.title: No Hub Required with Alexa
customer_reviews.text: There's a lot of misinformation in regard to these bulbs. All you need is an Alexa device. Screw in the bulb and turn it on. Tell Alexa to discover new devices and the light will flash. Alexa will name the light "first light by default". Tell Alexa to rename first light and she will ask you what you would like to name the light. Name the light and your all done. Easy.
customer_reviews.author: Boda

customer_reviews.title: Good smart bulb
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought sengled bulbs not knowing I needed a hub. I chose to get Echo plus which came with this Phillips bulb. I chose to put this bulb in my living room. Mine has so far stay connected to Alexa and I haven’t had a problem there. It lights up my living room nicely and I’m able to control it by voice with Alexa. I want to try the multicolor lights I’ve seen. I originally thought this was a warm/yellowish light. Turns out you can change that to white light! Very cool! You can also ask Alexa to dim the light or make it brighter
customer_reviews.author: Elle Em

customer_reviews.title: Without adequate support, good luck using this.
customer_reviews.text: Amazon support says to download the bluetooth app (what app? Not an Amazon app, you need an Android app) to pair the bulb with Echo Studio. But Play Store's Phillips app asks if the bulb is or is not Bluetooth. Well, nothing on the bulb, box, or sheet shows Bluetooth. The app goes on to say that a "bridge" is necessary, but the app couldn't find it. Amazon support says that the Echo Studio is a "bridge". An hour of support did not connect it; an Amazon customer explained how to do it with one command. This device is poorly supported but works when you know how.
customer_reviews.author: Tell the truth

customer_reviews.title: Good range of whites.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to swap out a hue multi color bulb that I was only using for the white tones and felt it was wasted in that lamp. It’s not the brightest (800 lumen, pretty bright by smart bulb standards), but it’s plenty bright with the lamp shade I’m using in the photo. I originally tried it in a different lamp with a dark lamp shade, it didn’t seem to get bright enough, once I switched it to a light colored lamp shade it was perfect. The range of cool to warm whites is perfect for what I needed, it’s able to get really cool or really warm (and everything in between).
customer_reviews.author: Erin R.

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE for hue owners.
customer_reviews.text: These are pure magic! Thought I'd try one or two with my normal white hue bulbs. Now I'm returning the white hues and getting more of these! Definitely worth saving up for! They help me to get to bed hours earlier and wake me up right before my alarm naturally. Amazing!
customer_reviews.author: musicmanyo

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: I loved these at first, especially the ability to dim them and change the color temperature to daylight using Alexa. Unfortunately out of the 4 that I used in my living room, only 1 of them still responds after a few months. I even tried to factory reset them but couldn't get them to pair again with Alexa. Very frustrating when "smart" bulbs work worse than old fashioned LED bulbs that are so much cheaper. Another complaint I have is that when you turn them off using the wall switch, they default to the yellowest "warm" white. I wish they would save the most recent settings even when they lose power.
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: not much settings

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect with Amazon Echo

I have tried the Phillips Alexa skill (which makes you register an email address, irritatingly) and the "discover devices" voice command and neither works. I am not willing to devote this much energy to getting a light bulb working. If I had paid for it I would be quite annoyed.

customer_reviews.title: not very bright

customer_reviews.title: Worked great - until 3mo after warranty expired, then it died

customer_reviews.title: Warning: This bulb requires a bridge (in addition to your smart hub)

When I tried to connect the Philips Hue bulb, my app said to press the button on the bridge. What? After some research, I discovered that another piece of hardware is required. Sorry, but I do not need the expense or complication when most bulbs connect directly to a smart hub. I gave it to a friend with an Apply Homekit and he had the same problem. The Philips Hue bulb went out with the trash.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed.

product_meta.title: Philips Hue White Ambiance A19 10W Dimmable LED Smart Bulb (Hue Hub Required, Works with Alexa, HomeKit & Google Assistant)
product_meta.description: Style:StandardLight for your moments, from sunrise to sunset. Add a Philips Hue white ambiance bulb to your system and enhance your home with shades of white lights. With a range from warm white to cool daylight, this bulb helps you to wake up, relax, read, concentrate or energize.
feature_bullets: With wireless control on your smartphone or tablet, choose the perfect light setting for any mood or activity such as reading or relaxing, concentrating, or energizing
Requiring the Hue Hub (sold separately) for the full Hue experience, this bulb fits standard-size table lamps
Install the LED light as you would install ordinary bulbs, pairing them with the Hue Hub, which allows you to control smart-bulb-equipped lamps and overhead lights via the Philips Hue App
Easily expand your lighting system with accessories (sold separately), such as a Hue Dimmer Switch, Hue Tap, or Hue Motion Sensor. Pair it for automation with your existing Nest or SmartThings system
This box includes one Philips Hue white A19 standard light bulb, manual, and two-year warranty

With the ready-to-use wireless Philips Hue Dimmer switch, you can brighten and dim your lights without a wired-in installation. Use the pre-set relax, read, concentrate and energize light recipes to maximize your daily routines
